item.title: Library - module Ploc
item.description: Explained that this module also contains pervasive type and function. Commented the pervasive type Ploc.vala and added the pervasive function Ploc.call_with.

item.title: Transitional and Strict - 1
item.description: Added more explanations about the two modes, and a short example of what the syntax tree quotation "q_ast.cmo" allows to do.

item.title: Transitional and Strict
item.description: Added chapter about "strict" and "transitional", allowing to choose between backward compatibility and a new feature: the syntax tree quotations in user syntax ("q_ast.cmo").
